Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at an apartment at the Lorain Overlook Apartments on East Erie Ave in Lorain.The apartment is on the bottom floor,so when I look out the window I'm at ground level.I had taken pictures out the back window(it faces the lake)the week before and got pictures of what I thought were orbs,so I started taking pictures again.I snapped a couple and looked at my camera(a Kodak 6.2 mega pixals)and saw a light,so I kept snapping more pictures.I did not notice anything in the sky at the time,although maybe I was too busy taking pictures to notice.I took a total of 22 pictures in 7 minutes,from 7:35 to 7:41pm,and when I got home and put them on my computer I was totally astonished to see what I had pictures of! I guess I was in the right place at the right time! All the pictures seem to show the object coming closer to me then going out on the lake,coming back and speeding away as balls of green and purple light came from it.This was definately an amazing thing to have caught on film!
Summary: UFO over Lake Erie in Lorain,Ohio
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Lorain
There were no other sightings in Lorain on or around September 17th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
